channel.title: DeXPeriX Home Page : Photoalbum > Drive
channel.description: Photos related to automobiles, motorcycles, travel and the like.

item.title: Opel Kadett
item.description: Be aware! Opel Kadett in 1986, 1.6 diesel, hetchbek. At the car, I will travel next couple of years. Unfortunately himself photographed at the wheel had not been able to:) The following pictures will be!

item.title: Opel Kadett
item.description: All the same opel, and all in the same garage. Pretty, is not it? :)

item.title: Opel Kadett
item.description: Opel is parked in front of shop. Note red machine is in harmony with the green grass:)

item.title: Opel Kadett
item.description: The same parking lot. Just a little-seen side machines, a little bit - salon.

item.title: Ford Scorpio
item.description: I love and complained - Ford Scorpio. Photo courtesy of his masters - XBE.

item.title: Reliable, as the Swiss bank
item.description:
And that Ford Scorpio XBE. Always under the protection :)

Current guard - Hrabrov Gleb V. :)

item.description: Ford Scorpio - as seen from the side

item.title: The change grows

item.title: Driving
item.description: And that I was driving this Ford :) Аrightful without driving licence to ride it! :-D

item.title: We with XBE in his Ford Skorpio
item.description: We with XBE. Such serious person ... Maybe not worthwhile for me to sit steering wheel? :-D

item.title: Cede the way!
item.description:
But we drove is not just any car! We still have something and that's worse :)

The main driver - Gleb. Driving a passenger bus MAN SR 280. The volume of engine: 11.4 litres. And 52 seats ...

item.title: MAN it is really man
item.description: And this is the bus, driven by Gleb sits.
